AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required for Condition 14 (Lighting Controls) and 19 (External Signage Illumination Control) of planning permission 19/03090/FUL(Demolition of the existing buildings and the erection of a self-storage facility (Use Class B8) with associated vehicular access and servicing, car and cycle parking, and landscape works.)
site_name: Nikon House 380 Richmond RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT2 5PR
decision_conditions: For the avoidance of doubt the illuminated advertisements shall only be illuminated between 0700 hours and 1900 hours.Reason: In the interests of residential amenity and highway safety and also that the Local Planning Authority shall be satisfied as to the details of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

for the avoidance of doubt the intensity of the illumination of the five internally illuminated signs on the northern and western elevations permitted by consent reference 21/00400/ADV shall be no greater than 300 candela per square metre. The sign on the southern elevation shall not be illuminated.Reason: In the interests of residential amenity and highway safety and also that the Local Planning Authority shall be satisfied as to the details of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
